about_me: Hello, my name is Eko Teguh Muhammadi. I live in Cilegon City, Banten, Indonesia. I was someone who has been interested in the computers and technology. I started learning programming in 2019. Since then, i gradually improve my skill until now and will keep improving in the future and always explore new things. I love to learn new things, write some code, creating some bugs, and play video games.
caption: I just keep trying to learn something new. Just simple like that!;
